name: Lock Mouse Cursor
description: Locks the mouse cursor within the screen while playing and prevents exiting the game by clicking outside the window

mod_enabled.name: Activate Cursor Lock
mod_enabled.description: Choose whether the mod is active or not

lock_on_left.name: Lock Mouse to Left Side of Screen (Disable for Right Side)
lock_on_left.description: Lock the mouse cursor to the left or right side of the screen. Useful for 2-player levels where the side is important.
